translated: With non-evident, non-impacting, non-cause, non-causally-related dhammas as condition there arises non-evident, non-impacting, causally-related dhamma as a cause condition. (In brief.) With cause as condition, there are three. … With non-obstruction as condition, there are three.

original: nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā
